item.title: Product Launch: Pizza Platter
item.dc:creator: Breckwerx Team
item.description: We're excited to announce our new product the Pizza Platter! It's perfect for serving up pizza or using as a cutting board to cut your pizza.

item.title: Product Launch: Light Fixture
item.dc:creator: Breckwerx Team
item.description: We're excited to announce our new light fixture product! It's perfect for giving a modern rustic look to the lights around the house.

item.title: What's New? - July 2023
item.dc:creator: Breckwerx Team
item.description: We just recived our aluminum cutting bits! We'll be annoucing new products soon that we know you'll love.

item.title: What's New? - June 2023
item.dc:creator: Breckwerx Team
item.description: We just upgraded our CNC software! This will decrease production time allowing us to get you your products faster!

item.title: Welcome to Breckwerx
item.dc:creator: Breckwerx Team
item.description: Welcome to the Breckwerx family! We're excited to show you the products we have. We know you'll love them as much as we do.
